Etienne Klein & Marc Lachi√®ze-Rey, The Quest for Unity - The Adventure of Physics, p.69

"The formalism with which particles and their interactions are described is called quantum field theory. Its two components are quantum physics and special relativity, both of which are completely at odds with ordinary experience."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Quantum Field Theory
